parameter.name: customer
parameter.description: The ID of the customer who will be billed when this invoice item is billed

parameter.name: amount
parameter.description: amount of the charge to be applied to the upcoming invoice

parameter.name: invoiceId
parameter.description: The ID of an existing invoice to add this invoice item to

parameter.name: subscription
parameter.description: The ID of a subscription to add this invoice item to

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: A set of key/value pairs that you can attach to a invoice item object.
